content: co tail near co edge using duplicate 21 24 27 30 33 sts stitch on knit side trim tail to approx 0 25 / 0 5cm tail should stay hidden in rolled hem round 18 sizes 3 4 5 only p to end decr round 19 p2tog p1 to end block to target dimensions 14 16 18 20 22 sts round 20 sizes 4 5 only p to end �� dimensions �� basket-wave hat page 3 �� stitch glossary & abbreviations �� stitches miscellaneous abbreviations k knit bor beginning of round kfb knit into front and back of same stitch co cast on k2tog knit 2 stitches together decr decrease p purl dpns double-pointed needles p2tog purl 2 stitches together incr increase round s round s rs right side sl slip purlwise with yarn in back st s stitch es ws wrong side # # # # # instructions for sizes 1 2 3 4 5 x# instructions to repeat x times questions or suggestions email erikafellerdesigns@gmail com this pattern is for personal use only do not reproduce in whole or in part without prior permission ©2025 erika feller basket-wave hat page 4
